# bridgecrew_mappings

Use this datasource to get the details of your check mappings.




## Example Usage
```hcl
data "bridgecrew_mappings" "all" {
}
```

- **guidelines** (Block List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--guidelines))
- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
